title: CivSynth City Plan Input Schema
description: Input contract for CIV.v0.1.0.CITY. Defines the minimum data required for density, greenspace equity, and transit/clinic access checks.

meta.description: Plan-level metadata used for provenance and jurisdiction routing.

plan_id.description: Unique identifier for this civic plan (stable across runs).

jurisdiction_code.description: Jurisdiction for this input payload. Must match CIV.v0.1.0.CITY for this schema.

generated_at_utc.description: ISO-8601 timestamp (UTC) when this plan snapshot was generated.

seed.description: Canonical deterministic seed used when generating this plan (ties into Deterministic Execution).

design.description: Aggregate design data for the civic area or zone under analysis.

type.description: Design type. The CIV.v0.1.0.CITY rules currently treat PGZ (Public Gathering Zone) specially for crowd-density checks.

area_m2.description: Total area in square meters for the design zone (optional but useful for diagnostics).

density.description: Projected maximum crowd density for PGZ analysis, expressed in persons per square meter. Used by rule C1.01.

residence.description: Residential units or blocks considered in the equity-of-greenspace analysis.

id.description: Identifier for the residence (unit, building, or block). Used for diagnostics.

dist_to_greenspace.description: Shortest walking-path distance in meters to the nearest accessible park/greenspace. Used by rule C1.02.

population.description: Optional population count for weighting equity calculations.

housing.description: Aggregate representation of public housing being evaluated for transit and clinic access.

type.description: Housing classification. Rule C1.03 currently targets type == "public".

dist_to_transit.description: Shortest walking-path distance in meters to an approved mass transit hub. Used by rule C1.03.

dist_to_clinic.description: Shortest walking-path distance in meters to a primary medical clinic.
